title: Went away for a week......
body:
Come back and am immediately reminded why I was taking a break. Two games with people instalocking a position I've already called.... one game where someone gave up first blood then said "gg" and started bitching about how everyone else was playing.

I've decided to mute anyone I'm not in skype with..... it's actually made the last two games really enjoyable. :-D

Kind of sad when it gets to the point where you have to preemptively mute everyone on your team just to enjoy the game..... however I highly recommend it if you are fed up with peoples bullshit.
